kDesc
The lower half of a stylish striped yukata with a with a vibrant Hibiscus design.\nDefensive Strength: ★\nStylishness: ★★[#Legal]

Parte inferior del kimono de verano a rayas con un exhuberante motivo de hibiscos.\nDefensa: ★\nBuen gusto: ★★[#Legal]
